PaladinMod:PaladinOrb.NAME: Paladin Orb
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, draw #b
NL #yEvoke: Deal #b damage to all enemies.

PaladinMod:SealOfRighteousness.NAME: Seal of Righteousness
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, gain #b
Plated Armor. NL #yEvoke: Spend all Devotion. Gain #b10 block per Devotion spent.

PaladinMod:SealOfLight.NAME: Seal of Light
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, heal #b
HP. NL #yEvoke: Spend all Devotion. Heal #b5 HP per Devotion spent.

PaladinMod:SealOfJustice.NAME: Seal of Justice
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive: At the start of your turn, gain #b
Thorns. NL #yEvoke: Spend all Devotion. Deal #b7 damage to each enemy per Devotion spent.
